title: How to Flip Someone over Your Shoulder

steps.title: Be in a fighting position with this person.
steps.content: Be in a fighting position with this person. Have your hands on their shoulders and their hands on your shoulders. Make sure that your hands are inside. This is a general description and will need to be adapted in any real fight situation.

steps.title: Turn around, stepping away from them, pulling them towards you - this throws off their balance.
steps.content: Turn around, stepping away from them, pulling them towards you - this throws off their balance. Grab their arm. Place your bottom into their hips, bend over, squat, and lift, while pulling their arm forward. You should be able to hold them on your hips. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Roll them off of your hip.
steps.content: Roll them off of your hip. Flipping them straight over your back or high into the air gives them a chance to recover and land or their feet or in some other stabilized position. It also has a great chance of straining your back if done improperly. You want to drop them from hip height, before they can right themselves. The goal is to let the ground knock the wind out of them. [2] X Research source Trained people can counteract this by releasing a kiai and knowing how to break their fall .

steps.title: Make sure they stay down.
steps.content: Make sure they stay down. Once they are on the ground make sure they slap the floor as they hit to prevent friction. Do Not Let Go of them until they have been on the floor for about two seconds.
